DocAttribute.Name: TranslationalStiffnessByLengthX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Translational stiffness value in x-direction of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: TranslationalStiffnessByLengthY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Translational stiffness value in y-direction of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: TranslationalStiffnessByLengthZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Translational stiffness value in z-direction of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: RotationalStiffnessByLengthX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Rotational stiffness value about the x-axis of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: RotationalStiffnessByLengthY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Rotational stiffness value about the y-axis of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: RotationalStiffnessByLengthZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Rotational stiffness value about the z-axis of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.
